entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the person who needs to see Professor Dumbledore and is running back up the corridor.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as the person Harry wants to see, but he is not present in the current location.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is mentioned as the person who is blocking Harry's path and is questioning him about his presence.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as a person who has turned up in the forest and is asking something, but it is unclear what he is asking for.

relationships.description: Harry wants to see Professor Dumbledore, as mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Snape.
Professor Snape is questioning Harry about his presence, as mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Snape.
